patterns.name: Using Intent getStringExtra
patterns.description: Using Intent.getStringExtra to get a string from an external source.

patterns.name: Using Runtime exec
patterns.description: Using Runtime.exec to execute a command from an external source.

patterns.name: Using ProcessBuilder init
patterns.description: Using ProcessBuilder to construct a process with arguments from an external source.

patterns.name: Using ProcessBuilder command
patterns.description: Using ProcessBuilder.command to set a command from an external source.
